markdownRemark.html:
Overview

  • Assessed needs of IT team for online product promotional site
  • Designedinterface for internal use to generate boilerplate webpages for product promotion
  • Collaboratedwith other interns to revitalize consumer point rewards program
  • Investigated projects invarious other company departments including accounting and customer servicewhile assisting other interns with their duties

frontmatter.title: Softare Engineering Intern: Ariat International
frontmatter.description: After my junior year of high school I was an intern at Ariat International in Union City, California.
